Roze is a true professional who is highly motivated and dedicated to his craft.  As a producer he paid careful attention to the details and as a director he was extremely supportive and respectful of the actors' creativity.  Because of his positive reputation he is also capable of bringing together many qualified and talented people to work with him on his projects.  I would happily work with him again and highly recommend him to anyone else as well.

Writer, Producer, Director at Candee Productions, Inc.

Roze is a very creative, energetic and inspiring person to work with.  We shot several projects together and he has a good eye, understanding of light and shadow, camera movement, composition and camera angles. --- All the technical tenets that comprise getting the shot.  More importantly he has a sense of the moment and context that moments exists within.  He's able to communicate essential intuitive insight that helps everyone on the shot get the best that moment was meant to have.

The dream of becoming successful is to never feel like what you're doing is work and when times are tough you look beside you and realize that you're surrounded by friends. It is my pleasure to recommend Roze. Not only did he do a great job when given a task, but also is a forward thinker and didn't need to be told. A great asset in a PA. He also paid attention to the creative side of the production and this will ultimately make him a great Director! It would be my pleasure to AD when he Directs.

Neil is an outstanding technician and artist and any film set would be fortunate to have him. Neil served as the gaffer on a horror film I directed and shot. He desire for excellence made it too easy to work with him. He could take direction to a tee or be left to his own method of execution - both resulted in a fast, safe and beautiful rigging. He prides himself it his work and it seriously shows. Neil really proves his value half way through a shoot when the exhaustion just starts to set in and he is still working with enthusiasm. His love of the film set is infectious. He reminds why this job rocks.

summary: I have been making films since 2002 and have developed a unique cinematic voice that has helped build a strong reputation among professional and bankable actors. My dedication to the work has allowed me to build relationships and networks to finance, distribution, international presales and talent attachments.  I have worked with a variety of production budgets and feel confident in delivering a professional product under any financial circumstance. Below you will find links to my work. I have carved out a strong niche in the horror and art house genre and I have built a fan base behind my work.Today my earliest films, All Dogs and M.O.M. are part of the curriculum at some of the most  prestigious film schools and fine art colleges in North America.  The short films I did ten years ago are finally getting me work with gritty ad campaigns like Venomocity’s anti-smoking PSA’s. You will find those below as well. Feel free to reach out to me if you are looking to attach a director to your project. I am currently reading scripts.
